requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium D 830 (2 * 3000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 610
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

results.name: Dr. Tantalus Quest for World Domination

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core, probably less
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any card will do... old school sounds but killing soundtrack!
  • Additional Notes: It's a 2D game made with godot 3.5, should run pretty smoothly everywhere...
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Anything above 7
  • Processor: extra cores extra spee but same FPS
  • Graphics: anything that cna handle a CRT shader
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

results.name: If you try hard enough, you can win.
